Articles.Content: Hi!! im looking for some cool people to play minecraft and make a dope world and enjoy each other company  the world will have rules of course but its chillin, no stealing just ask, respect , and whatever comes to mind. sadly this all has to be on xbox 360. sorry. my tag is FLASH333333333 lol sorry bout the three's. anyways hmu if you have kik at alexizlove93. hope to hear from you !! :3

Welcome aboard!

Not really a KSP topic, moved over to the Lounge.
@NoGameNoLife, I don't know about the Xbox, but if you have Minecraft on your PC, you may want to check out this thread:

Might want to try the Minecraft forum rather than one dedicated to a whole different game. Lot of overlap in the players (as @Mjp1050's post should attest to), but since this is your first post here (rather than one about KSP), you may not get a whole lot of response.

That said, welcome to the forum.

9 hours ago, pincushionman said:

Might want to try the Minecraft forum rather than one dedicated to a whole different game. Lot of overlap in the players (as @Mjp1050's post should attest to), but since this is your first post here (rather than one about KSP), you may not get a whole lot of response.

That said, welcome to the forum.

Not sure I would want to invite players from the average minecraft forum...

17 hours ago, NoGameNoLife said:

Hi!! im looking for some cool people to play minecraft and make a dope world and enjoy each other company  the world will have rules of course but its chillin, no stealing just ask, respect , and whatever comes to mind. sadly this all has to be on xbox 360. sorry. my tag is FLASH333333333 lol sorry bout the three's. anyways hmu if you have kik at alexizlove93. hope to hear from you !! :3

If you have an actual computer (consoles aren't real computers, you can tell that I'm PC gamer master race ), you should buy PC Minecraft and join the Forum Minecraft Group. Its a really nice place, we work on stuff together and have fun. Though its kinda and unwritten rule that you have to play KSP. Since you're posting here, I'm guessing you do. 

Oh, and welcome aboard the KSS KSP forum!

Edited December 21, 2016 by ZentroCatson
